text: Armando Christian Pérez (born January 15, 1981), better known by his stage name Pitbull, is a Grammy award-winning rapper, songwriter, and record producer. ==American Music Awards== |- | Camila Cabello & J Balvin |Choice Latin Song | |} == American Academy of Achievement == In 2019, he received the Golden Plate Award of the American Academy of Achievement during the International Achievement Summit in New York City. Year Nominee/Work Award Result 2019 Arts and Philanthropy Golden Plate Award == San Diego International Film Festival == Ceremony was on October 18, 2019. Previous winners include Kenny Loggins. Year Nominee/Work Award Result 2019 Life's Work Music Icon Award ==References== Pitbull
title: List of awards and nominations received by Pitbull
